Cerebral palsy is a lifelong condition that affects movement, muscle tone, or posture. Each child is different, and many grow, learn, and live meaningful lives with the right support.
Ang cerebral palsy ay kondisyon na nakakaapekto sa paggalaw at muscle control. Iba-iba ang bawat bata. Marami ang lumalakas sa tulong ng therapy, suporta, at pagmamahal.
CP awareness means understanding challenges, supporting families, and promoting accessible and inclusive communities.
Awareness reduces stigma, helps families find support, and improves access to therapies that change quality of life.

pairs.input: how do i raise cp awareness
pairs.response: Share accurate info, support local groups, join events, and encourage inclusive spaces at school and community.
Daily life varies — routines often include stretching, exercises, therapies, rest, play, and communication support. Small improvements matter.

pairs.input: how to help a child with cp
pairs.response: Balance play, gentle stretching, emotional support, and therapy routines. Celebrate progress, no matter how small.
Ang araw-araw na buhay may CP ay maaaring may therapy, pahinga, laro, at suporta. Mahalaga ang pasensya at pag-unawa.
Move slowly, support joints, follow therapy routines, celebrate wins, and rest when needed. Caregivers need care too.

pairs.input: how to be a good caregiver
pairs.response: Be patient, communicate gently, follow therapy guidance, and take breaks. Your well-being matters too.
Parenting a child with CP means celebrating small progress, supporting therapy, building routines, and offering emotional safety.
